attributes.action: lives not knives need goverment funding
attributes.additional_details: lives not knives is a campaign to take youth off the streets and away from gang violance. they do it in a humain way and do not pressure people. there is one problem though they do not get alot of goverment funding. the reason for this petiton is to get more funding an with this they will be able to expand there campaign

rejection.details: Thank you for submitting this e-petition. The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. This e-petition is about funding for a particular organisation. If your intention is that the Government should change the policy in realtion to these types of organisations generally,   then please make that clear and resubmit it. Thank you.
